## tracker status

Display when the current project was started and the time spent since.

### Synopsis


Display when the current project was started and the time spent since.

	Example:

	$ tracker start test +foo
	$ tracker status
	Project test [foo] started just now (2016-04-25 21:38:00 +0200 CEST)

```
tracker status
```
